title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the technical specifications for capturing and processing brainwave data (outline the hardware/software requirements for EEG devices, signal processing algorithms, and storage solutions), security standards (encryption methods, secure data transfer protocols, access controls), user experience expectations (intuitive interface design, minimal latency, error handling), data privacy and compliance requirements (GDPR, HIPAA, etc.), integration with existing systems or third-party services (API documentation, connectivity requirements), and performance benchmarks. Collaborate with the project team to ensure all aspects of the system are accounted for.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including components for brainwave data acquisition, processing, storage, and identity verification.

title: Implement Brainwave Data Acquisition
description: Develop the software and hardware components for capturing and digitizing brainwave signals from users.

title: Develop Brainwave Processing Pipeline
description: Implement algorithms and data processing techniques to extract unique brainwave signatures from the acquired data.

title: Design and Implement Database
description: Create a secure and scalable database to store and manage brainwave signatures and user identities.

title: Develop Identity Verification Module
description: Implement the core functionality for verifying user identities based on their brainwave signatures.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for capturing brainwave data and initiating identity verification.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Integrate robust security protocols and encryption techniques to protect user data and ensure system integrity.

title: Conduct System Integration and Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the integrated system, including functional, performance, and security testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Set up the production environment, deploy the system, and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API references, and user guides.
